description.english: You have achieved your first of many losses to come
Play a hundred games
Get terminated a thousand times
Fire one million buillets of any kind
Defeat ten thousand enemies
Upgrade your weapons one time
Upgrade your weapons a thousand times
Upgrade any weapon to the max
Turn the first boss in the game into dust
Crush the spirit of life out of the second boss
Return the third boss to its maker
Put the fourth boss six feet under
Turn the fifth boss into shards
Deal with the sixth boss
Complete a cycle
Eliminate the first boss without assistance
Eliminate the second boss without assistance
Eliminate the third boss without assistance
Eliminate the fourth boss without assistance
Eliminate the fifth boss without assistance
Eliminate the sixth boss without assistance
Complete the game without assistance
